## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description            | Type      | Default  |
| ---------- | ---------- | ---------------------- | --------- | -------- |
| `blurring` | `blurring` | Enable blurring        | `boolean` | `false`  |
| `padding`  | `padding`  | Show or hide the pager | `string`  | `"1rem"` |
| `pager`    | `pager`    | Show or hide the pager | `boolean` | `false`  |
